title: 捷克姐妹校夏令營 University of Hradec Králové Summer School 2024 (Art and Czech)
department: 國際事務處國際合作組
author: 梁忠誠
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際合作組 - 梁忠誠 - ice@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5108
對象： 全校學生
標題： 捷克姐妹校夏令營 University of Hradec Králové Summer School 2024 (Art and Czech)
日期： Wed, 6 Mar 2024 15:31:19 +0800
附檔： 2024 ART and Czech Summer school leaflet.pdf (148 KB)   
English version in below
◎時間：2024.7.14~2024.8.13
◎地點：捷克姐妹校 Faculty of Education, University of Hradec Králové, Czech Republic
◎費用：EUR 650 約新台幣23,000 （費用中不包含住宿、飲食、個人旅遊費用）
（Covers: airport-UHK coordinated bus transfer assistance (arrival and departure), 1 bus-assisted day trip and entrance with teaching support, material support for the art courses, study sheets for Czech and culture, 90 course classes, welcome and farewell certificate ceremony, UHK buddy student support.）
◎報名時間：2024.4.14截止

English version
◎Period：2024.7.14~2024.8.13
◎Location：Faculty of Education, University of Hradec Králové, Czech Republic （UHK）
◎Fee：EUR650 around NTD23,000 Fee does not include dormitory accomodation, food costs, individual travelling plans.
（Covers: airport-UHK coordinated bus transfer assistance (arrival and departure), 1 bus-assisted day trip and entrance with teaching support, material support for the art courses, study sheets for Czech and culture, 90 course classes, welcome and farewell certificate ceremony, UHK buddy student support.）
◎Registration Deadline：Until 2024.4.14

More Info：https://oia.ndhu.edu.tw/2024/03/14310.html
